contentList.content: Way of Springtime
After generations of caring for the earth and its creatures, these druid-like monks have embraced and been embraced by Chauntea.
Palpative Heat
Your strikes pulse like the heat of the earth, flushed skin, warm soil. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Cooling Cold
Your strikes soothe burns, calm anger, and thicken blood. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Fertile Earth
Your strikes synchronize with the earth, rhythms somewhere between love and an earthquake. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Gentle Wind
Your strikes embody a warm breeze on bare flesh, as nimble as wind rolling through wheat fields. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Charm Entity

You feel the air between you and your target undulating in time with their heartbeat. This creature must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
Hands of Healing
When you touch a creature, you can restore [1].

When you touch a creature, you can restore [1] and cure it of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISEASED">Disease</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralysis</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stun</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blindness</LSTag>.
Hands of Harm
Having seen and seeded so much life, you gain insight into its ruin. You can <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poison</LSTag> a creature you can touch indefinitely.
Hand of Ultimate Mercy
Bless a companion with your lips of life. They return from death with [1].
Caretaker's Caress

A heady rush of joy and adrenaline bubbles up from your stomach to your head. You feel closer to the earth and its children. You become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="AnimalHandling">Animal Handling</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Nature">Nature</LSTag>. Also, the birds near you are <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_SpeakWithAnimals">making sense</LSTag> now?
Caretaker's Tongue

A sensation like warm honey pours over your tongue. You become <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag>.
Skilled Hands

Your hands know the intricacies of most living things like their backs. Your strikes deal an additional [1], and ignore <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to Bludgeoning damage.
Bastion of Earth

Your body and soul unite to defend life. While not wearing armour, you add your Charisma and Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifiers</LSTag> to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

Separate the Chaff
When you bring a creature down to fewer than [2] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it dies and all nearby creatures take [1].
